title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-8.6 - Supervision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-8.6 - Supervision

State Regulations

Each salad bar operation must have at least one person as
signed to oversee its overall maintenance and operation in accordance with the
provisions of this Subpart 271-8. This person shall be available in the area of
the salad bar display unit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-8.6

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
